about_me_long_description: I am a highly motivated, ambitious, and creative person who can delight you by creating amazing websites. My skills and expertise include JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, Rest API, and Web development. I have worked on several projects that involved building scalable web applications, designing RESTful APIs, and implementing complex algorithms using JavaScript. Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new technologies, attending tech meetups, and contributing to open-source projects. My passion for coding extends beyond work, and I am always looking for ways to improve my skills and knowledge. Overall, I am a dedicated and experienced software developer who is committed to delivering high-quality solutions that exceed expectations.

portfolio.title: Food Website
portfolio.description: A dynamic burger builder application developed using HTML, CSS, ReactJS, and Firebase. This project allows users to create custom burgers by selecting various ingredients. The application features a responsive design, user authentication, and real-time order storage in a Firebase database.

portfolio.title: Tour Website
portfolio.description: Developed as part of a learning course, this engaging web application leverages HTML, CSS, Pug, NodeJS, ExpressJS, and MongoDB. The project features dynamic web pages rendered server-side with Pug, comprehensive user authentication, and seamless CRUD operations with MongoDB.

portfolio.title: Blockchain Based Secure E-Voting System
portfolio.description: We successfully designed and implemented an online voting system using cutting-edge technologies such as Ethereum, Solidity, Ganache, and Metamask. This project allows users to cast their votes securely and effortlessly.

portfolio.title: Ecommerce Website
portfolio.description: This application is developed by Next.js and Node.js, integrating Stripe payment gateway for seamless transactions. Implemented backend functionalities for a smooth user experience, including order processing and payment confirmation. Integrated Mailtrap and SendGrid services to ensure efficient email communication, with users receiving confirmation emails upon successful purchases.
